languages.text: {n}Служитель в богатом одеянии низко склоняется перед вами.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, для меня огромная честь служить вам в столь ответственном и славном деле, как церемония Магнэ Ацессио".

traits.locale_text: {n}Служитель в богатом одеянии низко склоняется перед вами.{/n} "Ваше Благородие, для меня огромная честь служить вам в столь ответственном и славном деле, как церемония Магнаэ Ацессио".

languages.text: {n}The servant in fine clothes offers you a deep bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a great honour to serve you in an undertaking as monumental and glorious as the Magnae Accessio ceremony."
languages.original_text: {n}Служитель в богатом одеянии низко склоняется перед вами.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, для меня огромная честь служить вам в столь ответственном и славном деле, как церемония Магнэ Ацессио".

traits.locale_text: {n}The servant in fine clothes offers you a deep bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a great honor for me to be serving you in an undertaking as monumental and glorious as the Magnae Accessio ceremony."

{n}The servant in fine clothes offers you a deep bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a great honor for me to be serving you in an undertaking as monumental and glorious as the Magnae Accessio ceremony."

{n}The servant in fine clothes offers you a deep bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a great honour to serve you in an undertaking as monumental and glorious as the Magnae Accessio ceremony."

{n}The servant in fine clothes offers you a deep bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a great honour to serve you in an undertaking as monumental and glorious as the Magnae Accessio ceremony."

{n}The servant in fine clothes offers you a deep bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a great honour to serve you in an undertaking as monumental and glorious as the Magnae Accessio ceremony."

languages.text: {n}立派な服に身を包んだ臣下が深々と頭を下げる。{/n}「陛下、マグナ・アクセシオの式典に並んで記念となる壮大な事業に従事できることを光栄に思います」
languages.original_text: {n}The servant in fine clothes offers you a deep bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a great honour to serve you in an undertaking as monumental and glorious as the Magnae Accessio ceremony."

traits.locale_text: {n}立派な服に身を包んだ臣下が深々と頭を下げる。{/n}「陛下、マグナ・アクセシオの式典に並んで記念となる壮大な事業に従事できることを光栄に思います」

languages.text: {n}这位衣着华丽的仆人向你深深地鞠了一躬。{/n}“大人，我何其有幸，能在如此庄严隆重的继任颂典中为您效劳。”
languages.original_text: {n}The servant in fine clothes offers you a deep bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a great honour to serve you in an undertaking as monumental and glorious as the Magnae Accessio ceremony."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位衣着华丽的仆人向你深深地鞠了一躬。{/n}“大人，我何其有幸，能在如此庄严隆重的继任颂典中为您效劳。”

languages.text: {n}El sirviente, ataviado con las mejores galas, se inclina ante ti.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, es el mayor de los honores poder servirle en una ocasión tan monumental y gloriosa como su Magnae Accessio».
languages.original_text: {n}The servant in fine clothes offers you a deep bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a great honour to serve you in an undertaking as monumental and glorious as the Magnae Accessio ceremony."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sirviente, ataviado con las mejores galas, se inclina ante ti.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, es el mayor de los honores poder servirle en una ocasión tan monumental y gloriosa como su Magnae Accessio».

languages.text: {n}Le serviteur drapé dans des vêtements élégants s'incline presque jusqu'au sol.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, c'est pour moi un grand honneur de vous servir et de participer à l'organisation d'une cérémonie aussi grandiose que celle de la Magnae Accessio. »
languages.original_text: {n}The servant in fine clothes offers you a deep bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a great honour to serve you in an undertaking as monumental and glorious as the Magnae Accessio ceremony."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le serviteur drapé dans des vêtements élégants s'incline presque jusqu'au sol.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, c'est pour moi un grand honneur de vous servir et de participer à l'organisation d'une cérémonie aussi grandiose que celle de la Magnae Accessio. »

languages.text: {n}Der gut gekleidete Diener verbeugt sich tief vor dir.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, es ist eine große Ehre, Euch bei einem so monumentalen und glorreichen Anlass wie der Zeremonie des Magnae Accessio bedienen zu dürfen."
languages.original_text: {n}The servant in fine clothes offers you a deep bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a great honour to serve you in an undertaking as monumental and glorious as the Magnae Accessio ceremony."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der gut gekleidete Diener verbeugt sich tief vor dir.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, es ist eine große Ehre, Euch bei einem so monumentalen und glorreichen Anlass wie der Zeremonie des Magnae Accessio bedienen zu dürfen."

languages.text: {n}Zarif giysiler içindeki hizmetkâr, önünde yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Magnae Accessio merasimi gibi muazzam ve görkemli bir teşebbüste size hizmet etmek büyük bir onur."
languages.original_text: {n}The servant in fine clothes offers you a deep bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a great honour to serve you in an undertaking as monumental and glorious as the Magnae Accessio ceremony."

traits.locale_text: {n}Zarif giysiler içindeki hizmetkâr önünde yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Magnae Accessio merasimi gibi muazzam ve görkemli bir teşebbüste size hizmet etmek büyük bir onur."
